timeline.bodyText: It's not just for information_schema. It affects DESCRIBE INPUT/OUTPUT and the jdbc.columns table. I would just get rid of in information_schema tables.
timeline.author: martint

replies.bodyText: Thanks, fixed. Maybe we want to fix RN wording as well then?
replies.author: findepi
